root.name: Conduit 2
root.description: OverviewConduit 2 is a sequel to High Voltage Software's previous Wii first-person shooter, The Conduit. As in the original game, Conduit 2 offers a high degree of gameplay customization.PlotConduit 2's story picks up where the original game left off. Mr. Ford, the protagonist, is teleported to a oil rig and runs in to John Adams; the man who hired Mr. Ford to the Trust. Adams plots to collect the four souls of progenitors so he can have their powers. Mr. Ford must get to them first before Adams does.GameplayGameplay resembles that established in the first game, though tuned and enhanced with optional support from Wii Motion Plus. All weapons can also be viewed through iron sights., similar to games such as Modern Warfare 2. In addition to the Wii Motion Plus accessory, Conduit 2 is also compatible with the Wii Classic Controller and Wii Speak. Players can customize load-outs of Mr. Ford's weapons and powers, and these loadouts can be used in both the single-player and multiplayer modes.MultiplayerConduit 2 supports multiplayer modes for up to four players in local split-screen and twelve players online. Game modes includes deathmatch, team deathmatch and team objective. Additional weapons and power ups that can not be found in single-player can be purchased in the multiplayer store.
